WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for checking :) Fixed that one as well.
WorkItem.Description:
The Zip Validator does not correctly validate Zip Codes:

The line:
var numberRegexp = /^[0-9]$/;

should actually be:
var numberRegexp = /^[0-9]*$/;

http://www.typescriptlang.org/Handbook#modules

REOPEN:
You missed a section, under "Adding Modularity" the regular Expression is not updated.
WorkItem.Summary: Bug in example code Modules section of Handbook

Comments.Message:
You missed a section:

under "Adding Modularity" the regular Expression is not updated.

Changed to /^[0-9]+$/. This gets rebuild nightly so it should show up tomorrow (it's based on the wiki page). Thanks!
